name: Talk with your Cat – Cat Translator
name_original: Talk with your Cat – Cat Translator
description:
THIS IS A GAME APP. YOU CAN NOT TALK WITH YOUR CAT LIKE YOU DO WITH YOUR FAMILIY AND FRIENDS. FUNNY APP TO MAKE JOKES AND EXERCISE YOUR AUDITORY MEMORY.

Your cat spends the day looking shrews without saying anything to you? When you talk to him, yawns or scratch and goes to sleep as if he was bored of you? If do you play with him, scratch like having a bit of rage towards you? Do you have the feeling that your cat avoids you? Do you disturb him?

The problems of communication with your cat have finished with Talk With Your Cat. You no longer have to spend entire evenings in an uncomfortable silence with your cat, or playing dominoes alone. And all thanks to three wonderful utilities of this app:

• ABC of cats
• Human–Cat Translator
• Meowed Words game

With the Talk With Your Cat app you will learn their ABC, rich phonetic nuanced. The translator enables you to construct sentences and then play them meowing, a good way to become familiar with the cats language and super useful in day to day with your cat.

When you have a good command of meow, try to test your knowledge with the game of meowed words. Twenty-one lessons in which you will have to understand the cat meow to form the respective sentences in your language. Drag the letters to the correct position.

Test your memory and retention capacity. If you learn to meow…, you will learn any language!

If you complete all the lessons and get the diploma to hang on the wall (as dentists), your life and your cat will be more enjoyable and funny. You can comment on films and TV reality shows, explain how was your day or accuse each other of cheating when you are playing board games, laugh about some dogs that get all the time the ball like fools; and much more!

No matter the breed of your cat, be it a Ragdoll, a common European Cat, Bengali, Angora, Norwegian Forest Cat, British Shorthair, Burmese, Persian, Russian Blue, Scottish Fold, Maine Coon, exotic cat, Snowshoe, Egyptian Mau, Siamese, Chartreux, Mumbai, Ocicat, Munchkin, Sphynx, or a street cat. Talk to your cat!

Download the Talk With Your Cat app for your favorite device fully free and learn how to meow with your best friend.
